Package com.tangosol.io.bdb

Contains Sleepycat Berkeley DB BinaryStore implementation classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BerkeleyDBBinaryStore An implementation of the BinaryStore interface using Sleepycat Berkeley DB Java Edition.
BerkeleyDBBinaryStoreManager An implementation of the BinaryStoreManager interface using Sleepycat Berkeley DB Java Edition.
DatabaseFactory Factory for Berkeley DB Environments and Databases.
DatabaseFactory.EnvironmentHolder Holder for Berkeley DB Environment and its Databases.
DatabaseFactory.EnvironmentHolder.DirectoryLock Directory based lock.
DatabaseFactoryManager A manager for Berkeley DB Database factories.
 

Package com.tangosol.io.bdb Description

Contains Sleepycat Berkeley DB BinaryStore implementation classes.
